articles.title: ICC World Cup: Pakistani cricket fan asked not to cheer for his country at Bengaluru stadium - Moneycontrol
articles.description: A Pakistani man was asked not to chant 'Pakistan Zindabad' during Friday's Australia vs Pakistan World Cup match in Bengaluru
articles.content: A Pakistani man was asked not to chant Pakistan Zindabad during Friday's Australia vs Pakistan World Cup match in Bengaluru. Footage that has been widely circulated online shows a policeman asking th… [+1457 chars]

articles.title: Bright Flashes, Mysterious Bang Shock Melbourne Residents - NDTV
articles.description: Brad Tucker, an astronomer from the Australian National University, said that the sound was likely due to the breaking apart of a basketball-size asteroid.
articles.content:
Social media users have been debating what caused the loud bang and mysterious lights.
People in Melbourne were shocked by a sudden bright flash of light and mysterious loud bang on Wednesday night.… [+1901 chars]
